definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (Ēl is (my) father, cf. [[אביהו]] & Ph. [[אבבעל]] (fem.), also [[אביבעל]]; & [[אבנבעל]] our father etc.; Abi-ba’al KAT:2 355; v. RS:Sem 45. Nö:ZMG 1888, 480 makes [[אבי]] here, & in [[אביהו]] etc., cstr. but this seems unlikely; cf. also [[אליאב]] etc.; views differ much as to these n.pr. and uniform interpr. is impossible. Cf. in gen. Ol:§ 277 f).
